languages.text: {n}Старик злорадно кривится.{/n} "Мы — чистые! Мы — Конгрегация, дети Многорукого Императора, генетическое совершенство бытия! Тебе не понять... Твоя плоть ущербна, твои гены сплетены из немощности и убогости. Мы — новый виток спирали. Мы едины, а потому сильны".

{n}His face becomes a gloating grimace.{/n} "We are the pure! We are the Congregation, children of the Many-Armed Emperor, the genetic perfection of existence! You will never understand... You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик злорадно кривится.{/n} "Мы — чистые! Мы — Конгрегация, дети Многорукого Императора, генетическое совершенство бытия! Тебе не понять... Твоя плоть ущербна, твои гены сплетены из немощности и убогости. Мы — новый виток спирали. Мы едины, а потому сильны".

You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."

languages.text: « Nous sommes les purs ! {n}répond-il avec une grimace proche de la jubilation.{/n} Nous sommes la Congrégation, les enfants de l'Empereur aux mille bras, la perfection génétique de l'existence ! Vous ne comprendrez jamais... Vous n'êtes que chair inférieure, vos gènes sont tissés de faiblesses et de misère. Nous sommes la nouvelle courbe de la spirale. Nous sommes uns, et ainsi, nous sommes forts. »
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes a gloating grimace.{/n} "We are the pure! We are the Congregation, children of the Many-Armed Emperor, the genetic perfection of existence! You will never understand... You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes les purs ! {n}répond-il avec une grimace proche de la jubilation.{/n} Nous sommes la Congrégation, les enfants de l'Empereur aux mille bras, la perfection génétique de l'existence ! Vous ne comprendrez jamais... Vous n'êtes que chair inférieure, vos gènes sont tissés de faiblesses et de misère. Nous sommes la nouvelle courbe de la spirale. Nous sommes uns, et ainsi, nous sommes forts. »

languages.text: {n}Su rostro se convierte en una mueca de regodeo.{/n} «¡Somos los puros! ¡Somos la Congregación, los hijos del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos, la perfección genética de la existencia! Nunca lo entenderás... Eres de cuerpo inferior; tus genes están tejidos con debilidad y miseria. Nosotros somos la nueva curva de la espiral. Somos uno, y eso nos hace fuertes».
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes a gloating grimace.{/n} "We are the pure! We are the Congregation, children of the Many-Armed Emperor, the genetic perfection of existence! You will never understand... You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro se convierte en una mueca de regodeo.{/n} «¡Somos los puros! ¡Somos la Congregación, los hijos del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos, la perfección genética de la existencia! Nunca lo entenderás... Eres de cuerpo inferior; tus genes están tejidos con debilidad y miseria. Nosotros somos la nueva curva de la espiral. Somos uno, y eso nos hace fuertes».

languages.text: {n}他发出了得意洋洋的怪笑。{/n}“我们是纯洁的信徒！我们是四臂神皇的子嗣，我们拥有完美的基因！你们永远都不会明白……你的肉体过于劣等，你们的基因由软弱与痛苦编织而成，而我们的基因螺旋是全新的构造。我们所有人一心同体，我们无比强大。”
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes a gloating grimace.{/n} "We are the pure! We are the Congregation, children of the Many-Armed Emperor, the genetic perfection of existence! You will never understand... You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."

traits.locale_text: {n}他发出了得意洋洋的怪笑。{/n}“我们是纯洁的信徒！我们是四臂神皇的子嗣，我们拥有完美的基因！你们永远都不会明白……你的肉体过于劣等，你们的基因由软弱与痛苦编织而成，而我们的基因螺旋是全新的构造。我们所有人一心同体，我们无比强大。”

languages.text: {n}彼の顔がほくそ笑んだ。{/n}「我々は純粋だ！我々は会衆だ！我々は多腕の皇帝の子供たちであり、完璧な存在だ！お前には分からないだろうな…お前は劣った肉体の持ち主であり、遺伝子は弱さと惨めさから編み出されたものだ。私達は螺旋の新しい曲線だ。我々は一つであり、ゆえに強いのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes a gloating grimace.{/n} "We are the pure! We are the Congregation, children of the Many-Armed Emperor, the genetic perfection of existence! You will never understand... You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の顔がほくそ笑んだ。{/n}「我々は純粋だ！我々は会衆だ！我々は多腕の皇帝の子供たちであり、完璧な存在だ！お前には分からないだろうな…お前は劣った肉体の持ち主であり、遺伝子は弱さと惨めさから編み出されたものだ。私達は螺旋の新しい曲線だ。我々は一つであり、ゆえに強いのだ」

languages.text: {n}Sein Gesicht verzieht sich zu einer Grimasse.{/n} "Wir sind die Reinen! Wir sind die Kongregation, Kinder des vielarmigen Imperators, die genetische Perfektion der Existenz! Ihr werdet es niemals begreifen ... Ihr seid von minderwertigem Fleisch, Eure Gene sind aus Schwäche und Elend gewoben. Wir sind die neue Kurve der Spirale. Wir sind eins, und daher sind wir stark."
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes a gloating grimace.{/n} "We are the pure! We are the Congregation, children of the Many-Armed Emperor, the genetic perfection of existence! You will never understand... You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Gesicht verzieht sich zu einer Grimasse.{/n} "Wir sind die Reinen! Wir sind die Kongregation, Kinder des vielarmigen Imperators, die genetische Perfektion der Existenz! Ihr werdet es niemals begreifen ... Ihr seid von minderwertigem Fleisch, Eure Gene sind aus Schwäche und Elend gewoben. Wir sind die neue Kurve der Spirale. Wir sind eins, und daher sind wir stark."

languages.text: {n}Yüzünü kötücül bir edayla buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bizler safızdır! Biz cemaatiz, Çok Kollu İmparator'un çocuklarıyız, varoluştaki genetik kusursuzluğuz! Siz asla anlayamazsınız... Sizler aşağı bir bedendesiniz, genleriniz zayıflık ve sefaletle örülmüş. Bizler spiralin yeni kıvrımıyız. Bir biriz ve bu yüzden de biz güçlüyüz."
languages.original_text: {n}His face becomes a gloating grimace.{/n} "We are the pure! We are the Congregation, children of the Many-Armed Emperor, the genetic perfection of existence! You will never understand... You are of inferior flesh, your genes are woven from feebleness and misery. We are the new curve of the spiral. We are one, and thus we are strong."
